body.name: Bruno Marc Men's Casual Slip-on Loafers Stretch Shoes 1.0
features: Fabric type 85% Cotton linen, 15% vegan leather

Soft & Breathable Upper: Built with a soft cotton linen upper for superior breathability. This pair of men’s loafer shoes feature skin-friendly inner lining, delivering a refreshing and cool environment for your feet
Comfortable Insole: Designed with a soft and breathable EVA sole, covered by a cork surface. This pair of shoes brings ultimate comfort, whether in summer or winter
Lightweight Slip-Ons: Each shoe weighs 0.38lb. A slow rebound EVA outsole is lightweight, wear-resistant, flexible, and absorbs shocks. These are the perfect pick for your work, daily wear, or travel

Fashionable Design: Rolled stitching and a padded collar deliver a trendy appearance. Matches well with jeans, shorts, or casual trousers. In addition, the wide forefoot design makes these slip on sneakers friendly for men with different foot types
Dedicated Service: For each customer, we offer an additional pair of shoelaces and insole in the box for easy replacement . Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any problems
body.description: Comfortable Enough to Wear All Day The knitted/cotton linen/canvas upper makes the casual slip-on shoes lightweight and breathable. Featuring soft mutispandex/canvas lining, this pair of men’s loafer shoes brings you a barefoot-like wear experience. The EVA sole provides good cushioning, which absorbs shock while you are walking. The Bruno Marc deck shoes give great support which are suitable for people who need shoes on their feet all day. You can take the shoes as home slippers, work shoes, or travel sneakers. Breathable and lightweight upper Smooth and soft lining Ultra-light EVA insole covered with a cork surface

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Go with the Breeze. Just like its name, you will feel ultimate comfort with these Bruno Marc shoes. Wherever the breeze blows, these shoes will follow. Our men's casual shoe wear will match a variety of outfits on a plethora of different occasions. They are great company for wherever you are. Enjoy new fashion for the contemporary man.

SPACEWALK TECH Boast SPACEWALK TECH., our insoles are made of cork and EVA, allows you to enjoy ultimate comfort, just like walking in the space. See the Insole Resilient Test video below. Soft Breathable Good cushioning Comfortable Enough to Wear All Day The knitted/cotton linen/canvas upper makes the casual slip-on shoes lightweight and breathable. Featuring soft mutispandex/canvas lining, this pair of men’s loafer shoes brings you a barefoot-like wear experience. The EVA sole provides good cushioning, which absorbs shock while you are walking. The Bruno Marc deck shoes give great support which are suitable for people who need shoes on their feet all day. You can take the shoes as home slippers, work shoes, or travel sneakers. Breathable and lightweight upper Smooth and soft lining Ultra-light EVA insole covered with a cork surface

Complimentary Laces and Insole Each order comes with a spare pair of laces and insoles The original laces are easy to slip on and off. Covered with a mesh fabric surface with holes in the body, this EVA insole is breathable, lightweight, cushioned, and shock-absorbent. Lightweight and Convenient Each shoe weighs 6.7oz. These lightweight men's shoes are the ideal choice for long walks, shopping, or traveling. There’s a knit/cotton linen/canvas upper. A multi-spandex canvas lining, flexible EVA insole, and outsole. A cumulation of high-quality materials contributes to our loafers being ultra-light and convenient. Put on these loafers for a casual walk after dinner, or carry them in your knapsack for a comfortable journey. Superior Durability A quality knitted/cotton-linen/canvas upper with neat fine stitching for an extraordinarily strong pair of loafers. With a cork surface and mesh fabric-covered EVA insole, these loafers are perfect for long-term wear. In conjunction with the flexible EVA outsole, these pairs of loafers provide great durability.
SBLS2302M SBLS2215M SBFS2301M SBLS2315M SBFS2304M Upper Knit Mesh Knit Mesh Mesh Fabric/Canvas PU PU Closure Type Elastic lace Slip on Slip on Slip on Lace up Arch Support ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Similar to Hey Dues but half the cost. Packaging is outstanding. Comes with extra insoles and shoe strings. Shoes are very comfortable. Would buy again and I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this shoe. It is light-weight, comfortable, and a good fit. And with its black soles to match the upper material, this shoe has an attractive appearance. This shoe appears to be well-made and comes with an extra pair of laces and cork inserts -- bonuses not usually found in shoes. The price I paid of $26.94 makes this product a good value. I would buy again at this or a similar price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and good for walking
reviews.reviewText: Combination of casual shoe and slippers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Husband Love these
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my Husband, for when we went on Vacation. He can be picky about any casual shoe, but let me tell you, he Loves these. They are so lightweight, he said they are very comfortable and the shoes coordinates with anything he wore. Great shoe for Great price, I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size runs at least 1/2 suze
reviews.reviewText: Not near as comfortable as hey dudes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my father and he really likes them. He has neuropathy in his feet and they work well for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bruno Marc shoes have quickly become my go-to footwear brand, and I can't say enough good things about them. From style to comfort, quality to affordability, these shoes have consistently exceeded my expectations. Here's why I'm such a devoted fan:1. Stylish and Versatile: One of the standout features of Bruno Marc shoes is their fantastic sense of style. Whether you're looking for a casual pair of sneakers, a dressy set of loafers, or something in between, they offer a wide range of stylish options to suit any occasion. The attention to detail in their design is evident, making these shoes a true fashion statement.2. Exceptional Comfort: Comfort is paramount when it comes to footwear, and Bruno Marc has nailed it. Their shoes are incredibly comfortable right out of the box. I've worn Bruno Marc shoes for long walks, all-day work events, and nights out, and my feet have always thanked me. The cushioning and arch support are top-notch, ensuring that you can stay on your feet without discomfort.3. Superior Quality: The durability of Bruno Marc shoes is impressive. I've owned several pairs, and they've held up remarkably well over time. The materials used are high quality, and the craftsmanship is evident in every stitch. These shoes are built to last, and I appreciate the investment in long-term wear.4. Affordable Luxury: One of the most remarkable aspects of Bruno Marc shoes is their affordability. You get a premium look and feel without breaking the bank. I've often been pleasantly surprised by how reasonably priced their shoes are, especially considering the level of quality and style they offer.5. Variety for Every Occasion: Whether you need formal shoes for a special event, casual sneakers for everyday wear, or comfortable boots for winter, Bruno Marc has you covered. They offer a broad selection of styles, colors, and materials, making it easy to find the perfect pair for any situation.6. Easy Sizing and Fit: Bruno Marc offers consistent sizing and a comfortable fit. I've found that their shoes generally run true to size, and their sizing chart is reliable. This makes online shopping for their products a breeze, knowing that you're likely to get a pair that fits you well.7. Responsive Customer Service: In the rare event that you encounter any issues or have questions, their customer service is top-notch. They are quick to respond and genuinely care about ensuring customer satisfaction.In summary, Bruno Marc shoes are a true hidden gem in the world of footwear. They combine style, comfort, and quality at an affordable price, making them a remarkable value. I've never been disappointed with any of my Bruno Marc purchases, and I'm continuously impressed by the brand's commitment to delivering excellence. Whether you're a shoe enthusiast or just in need of a dependable and stylish pair, Bruno Marc is a brand you can trust. Give them a try, and I'm confident you'll join the ranks of satisfied customers who swear by their footwear.
Son Lo Máximo... calidad, comodida y diseño a mi gusto, estoy muy satisfecho por esta compra sin duda alguna los volvería a Comprar.

These are the best loafers I have ever owned, just buy them dont wait. They feel a little like crocs, so they're very comfy, and my feet never get sore standing for long. They provide a lot more support than other thinner mens loafers, so thats why I went with them even though some other leather and nubuck loafers looked nicer. Ultimately picking these for the comfort was an excellent decision, and I was pleasantly surprised with the extra pair of soles they come with! And they look nice too considering it's fabric. They have held up in light rain too and my feet haven't gotten wet. I'd recommend spraying them with a hydrophobic coating when you first get them before you wear them. All in all, 5/5, accurate size, excellent quality, excellent comfort, unbeatable price. Would def buy again
Talleres perfecto. Muy cómodos y ligeros,no pesan nada. Vienen con plantillas de repuesto y otro tipo de cordón más sport a parte. Muy contentos con la compra
Además de la calidad y comodidad viene con una plantilla extra y un juego de agujetas adicional, la presentación en su caja es estupenda
